meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being Hispanic.
meanings.sent1: Her hispanidad was evident in her love for traditional Hispanic music.
meanings.sent2: The celebration of hispanidad was a colorful display of Hispanic culture.
meanings.sent3: At the party, hispanidad was the theme, with everyone enjoying Hispanic food and dancing.
meanings.sent4: In the vibrant city, hispanidad filled the streets with the sounds of Spanish music.
meanings.sent5: The hispanidad of the neighborhood made it a welcoming place for Hispanic families.

meanings.definition: The collective identity of Hispanic people.
meanings.sent1: The hispanidad of the community was strong, with everyone coming together for Hispanic Heritage Month.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of hispanidad when she saw the flag of her home country waving proudly.
meanings.sent3: The hispanidad of the group shone through as they shared stories of their heritage.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling market, hispanidad was reflected in the variety of Hispanic products available.
meanings.sent5: The hispanidad of the team brought them together to celebrate their shared culture.
